Detailed Description

Parses a DLS file image from an in-memory image.

DLS stands for DownLoadable Sound. It is a file that contains one or more wavetable based instruments.

This code is only used by the ME3000 API. It is not used by the ME1000 or ME2000.

Author:
Phil Burk, Robert Marsanyi Copyright 2004 Mobileer, PROPRIETARY and CONFIDENTIAL

Function Documentation

SPMIDI_Error DLSParser_Create ( DLSParser **  parserPtr,
unsigned char *  dlsImage,
spmSInt32  numBytes 
)

Create a parser for a DLS file.

[We associate image with parser at time of creation so we cannot reuse parser on another image.]

Parameters:
dlsImage address of DLS file image in memory
numBytes size of DLS file image
Returns:
0 if no error, or the following:
Exceptions:
SPMIDI_Error_OutOfMemory not enough free memory to allocate parser

void DLSParser_Delete ( DLSParser *  parser  ) 

Delete the DLS Parser.

spmSInt32 DLSParser_GetSampleRate ( DLSParser *  parser  ) 

Get sample rate for DLS parsing.

This is used by conditional chunks when querying device capabilities.

Returns:
0 if no error, or the following:
Exceptions:
SPMIDI_Error_IllegalArgument if parser is not initialized

SPMIDI_Error DLSParser_Load ( DLSParser *  parser,
SPMIDI_Context *  spmidiContext 
)

Load DLS instruments into SPMIDI synthesizer.

Note that this may only be called once for an spmidiContext. You must delete the context and create a new context if you want to load another DLS Orchestra.

Returns:
0 if no error, or one of the following:
Exceptions:
SPMIDI_Error_IllegalArgument parser or midi context has not been initialized
DLSParser_Error_NotParsed DLSParser_Parse() has not been successfully called
SPMIDI_Error_DLSAlreadyLoaded this midi context already has a DLS Orchestra

SPMIDI_Error DLSParser_Parse ( DLSParser *  parser  ) 

Read DLS instruments and wavetables from image.

Returns:
0 if no error, or one of the following:
Exceptions:
SPMIDI_Error_IllegalArgument if parser is not initialized
DLSParser_Error_NotDLS Form chunk is not DLS
SPMIDI_Error_OutOfMemory couldn't allocate required memory. Memory is allocated for waves, articulations, instruments, regions and the pool table.
DLSParser_Error_ParseError miscellaneous parsing error:
  • no DLS instruments found
  • no pool table found
  • no wave data found
  • number of instruments found doesn't match list
  • number of regions found doesn't match list
  • region doesn't include WLNK or RGNH chunks
  • articulation chunk not contained in region or instrument
  • conditional chunk expression doesn't evaluate to true or false
  • wave data not inside WAVE chunk
  • wave data found before FMT chunk
  • number of loops in WSMP chunk is greater than 1
  • WSMP chunk is not associated with region or wave
SPMIDI_Error_BadFormat couldn't resolve pool table to loaded wave data
DLSParser_Error_UnsupportedSampleFormat wave data is not in a usable format

SPMIDI_Error DLSParser_SetSampleRate ( DLSParser *  parser,
spmSInt32  sampleRate 
)

Set sample rate for DLS parsing.

This is used by conditional chunks when querying device capabilities.

Returns:
0 if no error, or the following:
Exceptions:
SPMIDI_Error_IllegalArgument if parser is not initialized
